bwwExcerpt: You can see light beaming from Laura Osnes at the Broadway Theatre, where she's playing the Cinderella of any girl's fantasy....Osnes has doe-eyed charm, a lovely soprano and whatever it is that separates a star from the chorus without trumpeting the fact. And in this first-ever Broadway production of "Rodgers + Hammerstein's Cinderella" she shimmers -- even when just about everything around her is flying off the rails.
